entry.title: FREEZING DRIZZLE ADVISORY , Yorkton
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 00:50 AM CST Monday 16 January 2023

entry.title: FOG ADVISORY , Yorkton
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:39 PM CST Sunday 15 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mist, -9.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Yorkton Airport 12:51 AM CST Monday 16 January 2023

Temperature: -9.3°C
Pressure: 101.0 kPa
Visibility: 2.8 km
Humidity: 93 %

Dewpoint: -10.2°C

Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Sunday night: Freezing drizzle. Low minus 12.
entry.summary: Freezing drizzle or light snow. Fog. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 18 overnight. Forecast issued 12:54 AM CST Monday 16 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Freezing drizzle. High minus 9.
entry.summary: Freezing drizzle or light snow ending in the morning then cloudy. Risk of freezing drizzle late in the morning and in the afternoon. Fog dissipating near noon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 9. Wind chill near minus 18. Forecast issued 12:54 AM CST Monday 16 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of light snow. Low minus 13. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of light snow. Risk of freezing drizzle in the evening and overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 13. Wind chill near minus 17. Forecast issued 12:54 AM CST Monday 16 January 2023
